channel.title: Hugo on Mylog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Mylog

item.title: hugo
item.description: How to use this template Click the Use this template button above. Create a new repo from this template. Rename it to <your_repo_name>. Don’t forget to check the box Include all branches. Change the baseURL in config.yml to your site’s URL. e.g. https://<your_github_id>.github.io/<your_repo_name> Open GitHub Pages in your repo’s Settings -> Pages -> Source: Deploy from a branch -> Branch: gh_pages -> Folder: /root -> Save. (*Optional)Create a markdown file to write your content in content folder.
